channel.title: DrygonScape 718! Unique memories!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xjmTo0v.gif[/img][/CENTER]
[SIZE=2][B][CENTER]DrygonScape has once again been lifted from it's roots back to the surface! Come join in and enjoy the game because we're here to stay with a stronger community than ever! Also back with some very unique content! We strive for an enjoyable game experience. I can confirm that all the skills are working 100%, so don't wait any longer and join Drygonscape 718/728![/CENTER][/B][/SIZE]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2zylpmx.png[/img]
[IMG]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3f/House_icon.png[/img]Website: [url=http://drygonscape.enjin.com/home]http://drygonscape.enjin.com/home[/url] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/keaq9g.png[/img]Forums: [url=http://drygonscape.enjin.com/forum]http://drygonscape.enjin.com/forum[/url] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/j6qro3.png[/img]Highscores: [url=http://drygonscape.net/highscores]DrygonScape[/url] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/zvq3vb.png[/img]Vote: [url=http://drygonscape.net/vote]DrygonScape - Voting[/url] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2ymc5lv.png[/img]Download: [url=http://www.drygonscape.net/drygonscape.jar]www.drygonscape.net/drygonscape.jar[/url]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/263ww7n.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][CENTER][SIZE=2]- ClanChat - Vorago! - Duel Arena - Dungeoneering System - Decent and fun economy. - 24.7 Uptime - Trading - Webclient - Forums - AutoCasting - 100% Private Messaging - Active helpful staff - 4 different Donator status - Regular updates! - Completely Lag Free! - All skills trainable! - Summoning - 100% working leeches - Working Korasi’s Sword & others such as D claws. - Multi Barrages - Xp Counter - Yell with custom colours! - Working weapon specs and effects - Working curses prayer book, including Turmoil! - All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars - All Spirit shields working, Even their effects - Working Teleblock - Staff of light Special - Daily Events! - Player run economy! - Player's get to vote updates! - Unique Adventures Log - Unique Dry Point system - Nice xp rates! - Working Fight Caves/Fight Kiln - Warriors Guild/Dominion Tower - Ganodermic Beasts - 120 Skill Capes - Royal Crossbow - Amazing Community - Drygores - Choose your own XP! - Unique Quests - Tons of Completionist cape requirements! - 10 Prestige levels! With awesome rewards! - Loyalty point system! - 10 Digit bank pins! Anti-hax! - DDoS Protected VPS! - 3 second character saving. Prevent rollbacks! - Custom character clothing saving![/SIZE][/CENTER][/B]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2ly6b1h.png[/img]

item.title: DrygonScape 718! Unique memories!
item.dc:creator: @briney21 briney21
item.description:
@briney21 wrote:

looks cool but worrying that it has been down and up before means that its highly likely its going to happen again

Read full topic

item.title: DrygonScape 718! Unique memories!
item.dc:creator: @joopz joopz
item.description:
@joopz wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

[SIZE=2][B][CENTER]DrygonScape has once again been lifted from it’s roots back to the surface! Come join in and enjoy the game because we’re here to stay with a stronger community than ever! Also back with some very unique content! We strive for an enjoyable game experience. I can confirm that all the skills are working 100%, so don’t wait any longer and join Drygonscape 718/728![/CENTER][/B][/SIZE]

[CENTER]

Website: http://drygonscape.enjin.com/home
Forums: http://drygonscape.enjin.com/forum
Highscores: DrygonScape
Vote: DrygonScape - Voting
Download: www.drygonscape.net/drygonscape.jar

[/CENTER]

[B][CENTER][SIZE=2]- ClanChat

  • Vorago!
  • Duel Arena
  • Dungeoneering System
  • Decent and fun economy.
  • 24.7 Uptime
  • Trading
  • Webclient
  • Forums
  • AutoCasting
  • 100% Private Messaging
  • Active helpful staff
  • 4 different Donator status
  • Regular updates!
  • Completely Lag Free!
  • All skills trainable!
  • Summoning
  • 100% working leeches
  • Working Korasi’s Sword & others such as D claws.
  • Multi Barrages
  • Xp Counter
  • Yell with custom colours!
  • Working weapon specs and effects
  • Working curses prayer book, including Turmoil!
  • All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars
  • All Spirit shields working, Even their effects
  • Working Teleblock
  • Staff of light Special
  • Daily Events!
  • Player run economy!
  • Player’s get to vote updates!
  • Unique Adventures Log
  • Unique Dry Point system
  • Nice xp rates!
  • Working Fight Caves/Fight Kiln
  • Warriors Guild/Dominion Tower
  • Ganodermic Beasts
  • 120 Skill Capes
  • Royal Crossbow
  • Amazing Community
  • Drygores
  • Choose your own XP!
  • Unique Quests
  • Tons of Completionist cape requirements!
  • 10 Prestige levels! With awesome rewards!
  • Loyalty point system!
  • 10 Digit bank pins! Anti-hax!
  • DDoS Protected VPS!
  • 3 second character saving. Prevent rollbacks!
  • Custom character clothing saving![/SIZE][/CENTER][/B]

[CENTER]

















[/CENTER]
